s.text: I am writing only to indicate what pleasure the ballet, now readily available on videotape, has given this klutz, and to suggest that others like me might also get pleasure from it.
At first sight they look easy, although further observation shows how precise and disciplined the movements are.
In a sense, you get more ballet for your money in the Kirov version.
At first sight they look easy, although further observation shows how precise and disciplined the movements are.
One of my first dates with the young woman who was to be my wife took us to Les Sylphides downtown in the Loop.
